title: AI Startup Landing Page
creator: griffin
prompt: Create a clean and professional landing page for a startup using modern design trends, SEO optimization, and mobile responsiveness.
notes: Built entirely from a single prompt. Includes scroll animations and responsive CTA sections.

title: Minimal Recipe Blog
creator: chefbot
prompt: Generate a minimalist recipe blog with a focus on easy meal ideas, mobile-first layout, and optional newsletter signup.

title: Local Events Map
creator: mapgenius
prompt: Build a local event directory using a map layout that allows users to browse nearby events. Prioritize clarity and fast loading.
notes: Displays upcoming festivals and live shows. Integrated static map with filter options.
